title: Intro to CEDT Final Project The Web That had to Connect With The AI API
subtitle:
Developed an AI-powered web application for cooking assistance utilizing Generative AI and prompt engineering. The system analyzes user inputs—either via menu names or food photos—to generate detailed recipes, cooking times, and nutritional values. Successfully presented the project to news agencies, resulting in a featured publication on the

Website : Chulalongkorn University website.
GitHub : View Repository.
